about_the_game:
First came The Most Awesome Game Ever Made... Now, get ready for The Most Awesome Soundtrack Ever Made

If you enjoyed The Most Awesome Game Ever Made, then purchasing the Soundtrack is a brilliant way to go the extra mile to help support the Developer's work on future projects.

  • Lollipops on Toast
  • Never Trust an Evil Scientist
  • Tumble in the Jungle
  • Disco-nnected
  • Don't be a Wise Guy
  • Beach Please
  • Frosty's Frolicking Fun
  • Robot Sharks in Space
  • A Job Well Done
  • The NerdyBird Catches The Worm
  • Tumble in the Jungle [Alternative]
  • Disco-nnected [Alternative]
  • Beach Please [Alternative]

Music composed in 2017 by the talented, HMN Music. (be sure to check out his other work)

Thank you so much for checking out this Album!
